name: Crowd 2 Plugin 3.2.1
body:
<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
## 📝 Documentation updates

* docs: update used versions and fix urls (#120) @DuMaM

## 👻 Maintenance

* chore(deps): bump crowdin/github-action from 1.4.16 to 1.5.0 (#124) @dependabot
* chore: update GH to not use node 12 (#118) @DuMaM

## 📦 Dependency updates

* chore(deps): bump actions/dependency-review-action from 2 to 3 (#125) @dependabot
* chore(deps): bump crowdin/github-action from 1.4.16 to 1.5.0 (#124) @dependabot
* deps: update bom to 1654.vcb_69d035fa_20 (#121) @DuMaM
* chore: bump crowd2 plugin to 4.4.3 (#116) @DuMaM
* chore: upgrade Jenkins core to 2.346.1 (#114) @DuMaM
* Bump plugin from 4.43.1 to 4.48 (#108) @dependabot
* Bump crowdin/github-action from 1.4.15 to 1.4.16 (#113) @dependabot

## 📓  NOTES:

* this is last release which will work with java 8

name: Crowd 2 Plugin 3.2.0
body:
<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
## 🚀 New features and improvements

* chore: add some tooling and improve scripts (#102) @DuMaM

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* fix: ci builds (#112) @DuMaM
* [JENKINS-68708](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-68708) - CrowdSecurityRealm: Prevent trim() calls on null strings (#98) @proski

## 🌐 Localization and translation

* Update localization (#100) @github-actions
* config.properties: Clarify that the listed groups are allowed to login (#99) @proski
* Update localization (#90) @github-actions
* Update localization (#80) @github-actions
* Update localization (#79) @github-actions
* Update localization (#78) @github-actions

## 📝 Documentation updates

* chore: replace usage of GITHUB_TOKEN secret with GH_PERSONAL_TOKEN (#101) @DuMaM

## 👻 Maintenance

* chore: add some tooling and improve scripts (#102) @DuMaM

* chore: enable release drafter (#97) @DuMaM

* Bump crowdin/github-action from 1.4.14 to 1.4.15 (#111) @dependabot

* Bump plugin from 4.41 to 4.43.1 (#91) @dependabot

name: Crowd 2 Plugin 3.1.2
body:
## What's Changed
* [Improvement] Remove deprecations. acegisecurity -> springframework by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/65
* [Improvement] Remove reported form SonarCode code smells  by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/67
* [[JENKINS-62291](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-62291)] [[JENKINS-53677](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-53677)] [[JENKINS-27682](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-27682)] [Bugfix] Update email property is working now @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/66
* [Improvement] Use consistent way of logging by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/68
* Bump findsecbugs-plugin from 1.10.1 to 1.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/70
* Bump bom-2.303.x from 1246.va_b_50630c1d19 to 1342.v729ca_3818e88 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/69
* [[JENKINS-68459](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-68459)] [[JENKINS-68410](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-68410)] [Bugfix] Prepare Crowd 2 Integration for removal of JAXB and Java 11 requirement by @basil in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/72 and by @ikedam in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/71

## New Contributors
* @basil made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/72

## Notes:
### Were are other releases <= 3.1.2? 
After migration of acegisecutiry, this plugin needed some additional fixes. 
To easily track progress of those my work, I was bumping version every important change or fix.
For some users crowd2 is quite important part of they CI, and I didn't want to ruin their job.
That's why those versions weren't released.
From now on I will release this in normal manner.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/compare/crowd2-2.2.0...crowd2-3.1.2

name: crowd2-2.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump commons-lang3 from 3.8 to 3.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/47
* Bump assertj-core from 3.13.2 to 3.22.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/46
* Bump Jenkins core to 2.303.1 by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/58
* Replace deprecated Jenkins.getInstance() with Jenkins.get() by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/57
* Refactor duplicated code for cache operation by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/59
* Enable findsecbugs plugin from spotbugs by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/61
* Enable SonarQube scans by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/62
* [Bugfix] Remove code smells reported by SonarQube by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/63
* Remove duplicated code for getting user groups by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/64

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/47

## Known Issues
❗ ❗ Due to missed dependency for java 11 please install https://plugins.jenkins.io/jaxb/ ❗ ❗ 


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/compare/crowd2-2.1.0...crowd2-2.2.0

name: crowd2-2.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* [[JENKINS-59301]](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-59301) Update plugin build process by @alecharp in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/35
* Use HTTPS URLs in pom.xml by @daniel-beck-bot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/38
* Update core to 2.277 and parent pom by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/42
* [[JENKINS-59301]](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-59301)  Crowd 2 plugin not compatible with JDK11 by @Rifffi in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/40
* [[JENKINS-64186]](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-64186)  Fixing keep me signed in by @SpiReCZ in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/41
* Add GitHub action for updating dependencies by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/43
* Add release drafter GitHub action by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/49
* Migrate documentation from wiki by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/50
* Add security scan workflow by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/51
* Add billing materials and upgrade core to 2.289.1 by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/52
* Add Gitpod config by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/54
* Add common development environment settings by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/53
* Improve development environment by adding java version selector by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/56
* Add `@POST` decorator to public form functions by @DuMaM in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/55

## New Contributors
* @alecharp made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/35
* @daniel-beck-bot made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/38
* @DuMaM made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/42
* @Rifffi made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/40
* @SpiReCZ made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/pull/41

## Known Issues
❗ ❗ Due to missed dependency for java 11 please install https://plugins.jenkins.io/jaxb/ ❗ ❗ 

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/crowd2-plugin/compare/crowd2-2.0.2...crowd2-2.1.0

Bugs
* Prevent possible NullPointerException (#31)

Thanks a lot @msglueck for your PR

Bugs
* [JENKINS-16703](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-16703)
* [JENKINS-27070](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-27070)

Improvements
* [JENKINS-40472](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-40472)
* Added possibility to enable caching to reduce remote calls to Crowd

Thanks a lot @aheritier, @gmshake and all others who tested, gave input and had patience :+1:
